metadata.description: Will Solana touch or exceed $120.00 on 2026-02-15 (UTC) based on CoinGecko?

outcome_space.description: Whether Solana USD will reach or exceed $120.00 at any time during 2026-02-15 UTC.

base_case.condition: If the maximum Solana USD price observed in the UTC window [2026-02-15T00:00:00Z, 2026-02-16T00:00:00Z) is >= 120.00.
base_case.fsp_resolution: Resolve YES (1) if any sampled price >= 120.00 USD. Otherwise resolve NO (0).

edge_cases.condition: If CoinGecko returns no price samples in the observation window.
edge_cases.fsp_resolution: Mark FSP as UNRESOLVED and allow oracle_fallback to trigger.

outcome_point.outcome: YES if >=120.00 USD on 2026-02-15 UTC, otherwise NO

oracle_config.description: Fetch Solana USD prices from CoinGecko over a fixed 24h UTC window and evaluate max(price) >= 120.00.
